column1: #text=I went to the library the other day -LRB- on Saturday -RRB- to borrow a book .
#text=In the process , I stepped into the library and headed straight to the section of the book I wanted to borrow .
#text=I plan ahead of time where the book may be as I know borrowing books at my particular library is rather competitive .
#text=I had to find my way through several aisles in order to get to the right alphabetical order .
#text=I found the author and to my luck , the book I wanted was there .
#text=Surprisingly , there were actually three copies even though the book is rather popular .
#text=I grabbed the book and headed to the self-checkout register near the back of the library .
#text=I scanned my library card off my key chain and scanned the book .
#text=After confirming the entire transaction , I grabbed my receipt and happily headed out the library with my newly borrowed book in hand .
